acceptRelationship.enterAuthCode: Please enter the authorisation code for the relationship you wish to establish.
acceptRelationship.insufficientStrength: YOUR CREDENTIAL CANNOT ACCEPT THIS AUTHORISATION. The identity in your credential has not been verified to the level required to accept a universal representative authorisation. To accept this authorisation you need to verify the identity of your credential or use a credential with a verified identity. See Help for instructions.
